description: Provides the results of the Inference Recommender job. One or more recommendation jobs are returned.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: The name of the job. The name must be unique within an Amazon Web Services Region in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job. The name must be unique within an Amazon Web Services Region in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: JobDescription
nested_items.description: The job description that you provided when you initiated the job.

nested_items.name: JobType
nested_items.description: The job type that you provided when you initiated the job.

nested_items.name: JobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the job.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) role you provided when you initiated the job.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the job.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that shows when the job was created.

nested_items.name: CompletionTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that shows when the job completed.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that shows when the job was last modified.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the job fails, provides information why the job failed.

nested_items.name: InputConfig
nested_items.description: Returns information about the versioned model package Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the traffic pattern, and endpoint configurations you provided when you initiated the job.

nested_items.name: ModelPackageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a versioned model package.

nested_items.name: ModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the created model.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: Specifies the maximum duration of the job, in seconds. The maximum value is 18,000 seconds.

nested_items.name: TrafficPattern
nested_items.description: Specifies the traffic pattern of the job.

nested_items.name: TrafficType
nested_items.description: Defines the traffic patterns. Choose either PHASES or STAIRS.

nested_items.name: Phases
nested_items.description: Defines the phases traffic specification.

nested_items.name: InitialNumberOfUsers
nested_items.description: Specifies how many concurrent users to start with. The value should be between 1 and 3.

nested_items.name: SpawnRate
nested_items.description: Specified how many new users to spawn in a minute.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: Specifies how long a traffic phase should be. For custom load tests, the value should be between 120 and 3600. This value should not exceed JobDurationInSeconds.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: Defines how long each traffic step should be.

nested_items.name: NumberOfSteps
nested_items.description: Specifies how many steps to perform during traffic.

nested_items.name: UsersPerStep
nested_items.description: Specifies how many new users to spawn in each step.

nested_items.name: ResourceLimit
nested_items.description: Defines the resource limit of the job.

nested_items.name: MaxNumberOfTests
nested_items.description: Defines the maximum number of load tests.

nested_items.name: MaxParallelOfTests
nested_items.description: Defines the maximum number of parallel load tests.

nested_items.name: EndpointConfigurations
nested_items.description: Specifies the endpoint configuration to use for a job.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance types to use for the load test.

nested_items.name: ServerlessConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the serverless configuration for an endpoint variant.

nested_items.name: MemorySizeInMB
nested_items.description: The memory size of your serverless endpoint. Valid values are in 1 GB increments: 1024 MB, 2048 MB, 3072 MB, 4096 MB, 5120 MB, or 6144 MB.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of concurrent invocations your serverless endpoint can process.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedConcurrency
nested_items.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency to allocate for the serverless endpoint. Should be less than or equal to MaxConcurrency.

nested_items.name: InferenceSpecificationName
nested_items.description: The inference specification name in the model package version.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentParameterRanges
nested_items.description: The parameter you want to benchmark against.

nested_items.name: CategoricalParameterRanges
nested_items.description: Specified a list of parameters for each category.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The Name of the environment variable.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The list of values you can pass.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: VolumeKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (Amazon Web Services KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data on the storage volume attached to the ML compute instance that hosts the endpoint. This key will be passed to SageMaker Hosting for endpoint creation.
// KMS Key ID "1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab"
// Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a KMS Key "arn:aws:kms:<region>:<account>:key/<key-id-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab>"
// KMS Key Alias "alias/ExampleAlias"
// Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a KMS Key Alias "arn:aws:kms:<region>:<account>:alias/<ExampleAlias>"

nested_items.name: ContainerConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies mandatory fields for running an Inference Recommender job. The fields specified in ContainerConfig override the corresponding fields in the model package.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The machine learning domain of the model and its components.

nested_items.name: Task
nested_items.description: The machine learning task that the model accomplishes.

nested_items.name: Framework
nested_items.description: The machine learning framework of the container image.

nested_items.name: FrameworkVersion
nested_items.description: The framework version of the container image.

nested_items.name: PayloadConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the SamplePayloadUrl and all other sample payload-related fields.

nested_items.name: SamplePayloadUrl
nested_items.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) path where the sample payload is stored. This path must point to a single gzip compressed tar archive (.tar.gz suffix).

nested_items.name: SupportedContentTypes
nested_items.description: The supported MIME types for the input data.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NearestModelName
nested_items.description: The name of a pre-trained machine learning model benchmarked by Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender that matches your model.

nested_items.name: SupportedInstanceTypes
nested_items.description: A list of the instance types that are used to generate inferences in real-time.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SupportedEndpointType
nested_items.description: The endpoint type to receive recommendations for. By default this is null, and the results of the inference recommendation job return a combined list of both real-time and serverless benchmarks. By specifying a value for this field, you can receive a longer list of benchmarks for the desired endpoint type.

nested_items.name: DataInputConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the name and shape of the expected data inputs for your trained model with a JSON dictionary form. This field is used for optimizing your model using SageMaker Neo. For more information, see DataInputConfig.

nested_items.name: SupportedResponseMIMETypes
nested_items.description: The supported MIME types for the output data.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Endpoints
nested_items.description: Existing customer endpoints on which to run an Inference Recommender job.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of a customer's endpoint.

nested_items.name: VpcConfig
nested_items.description: Inference Recommender provisions SageMaker endpoints with access to VPC in the inference recommendation job.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The VPC security group IDs. IDs have the form of sg-xxxxxxxx. Specify the security groups for the VPC that is specified in the Subnets field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Subnets
nested_items.description: The ID of the subnets in the VPC to which you want to connect your model.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StoppingConditions
nested_items.description: The stopping conditions that you provided when you initiated the job.

nested_items.name: MaxInvocations
nested_items.description: The maximum number of requests per minute expected for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: ModelLatencyThresholds
nested_items.description: The interval of time taken by a model to respond as viewed from SageMaker. The interval includes the local communication time taken to send the request and to fetch the response from the container of a model and the time taken to complete the inference in the container.

nested_items.name: Percentile
nested_items.description: The model latency percentile threshold. Acceptable values are P95 and P99. For custom load tests, specify the value as P95.

nested_items.name: ValueInMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The model latency percentile value in milliseconds.

nested_items.name: FlatInvocations
nested_items.description: Stops a load test when the number of invocations (TPS) peaks and flattens, which means that the instance has reached capacity. The default value is Stop. If you want the load test to continue after invocations have flattened, set the value to Continue.

nested_items.name: InferenceRecommendations
nested_items.description: The recommendations made by Inference Recommender.

nested_items.name: RecommendationId
nested_items.description: The recommendation ID which uniquely identifies each recommendation.

nested_items.name: CostPerHour
nested_items.description: Defines the cost per hour for the instance.

nested_items.name: CostPerInference
nested_items.description: Defines the cost per inference for the instance .

nested_items.name: MaxInvocations
nested_items.description: The expected maximum number of requests per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: ModelLatency
nested_items.description: The expected model latency at maximum invocation per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: CpuUtilization
nested_items.description: The expected CPU utilization at maximum invocations per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: MemoryUtilization
nested_items.description: The expected memory utilization at maximum invocations per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: ModelSetupTime
nested_items.description: The time it takes to launch new compute resources for a serverless endpoint. The time can vary depending on the model size, how long it takes to download the model, and the start-up time of the container.

nested_items.name: EndpointConfiguration
nested_items.description: Defines the endpoint configuration parameters.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint made during a recommendation job.

nested_items.name: VariantName
nested_items.description: The name of the production variant (deployed model) made during a recommendation job.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type recommended by Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender.

nested_items.name: InitialInstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances recommended to launch initially.

nested_items.name: ServerlessConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the serverless configuration for an endpoint variant.

nested_items.name: MemorySizeInMB
nested_items.description: The memory size of your serverless endpoint. Valid values are in 1 GB increments: 1024 MB, 2048 MB, 3072 MB, 4096 MB, 5120 MB, or 6144 MB.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrency
nested_items.description: The maximum number of concurrent invocations your serverless endpoint can process.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedConcurrency
nested_items.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency to allocate for the serverless endpoint. Should be less than or equal to MaxConcurrency.

nested_items.name: ModelConfiguration
nested_items.description: Defines the model configuration.

nested_items.name: InferenceSpecificationName
nested_items.description: The inference specification name in the model package version.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentParameters
nested_items.description: Defines the environment parameters that includes key, value types, and values.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The environment key suggested by the Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender.

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: The value type suggested by the Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value suggested by the Amazon SageMaker Inference Recommender.

nested_items.name: CompilationJobName
nested_items.description: The name of the compilation job used to create the recommended model artifacts.

nested_items.name: InvocationEndTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that shows when the benchmark completed.

nested_items.name: InvocationStartTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that shows when the benchmark started.

nested_items.name: EndpointPerformances
nested_items.description: The performance results from running an Inference Recommender job on an existing endpoint.

nested_items.name: MaxInvocations
nested_items.description: The expected maximum number of requests per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: ModelLatency
nested_items.description: The expected model latency at maximum invocations per minute for the instance.

nested_items.name: EndpointInfo
nested_items.description: Details about a customer endpoint that was compared in an Inference Recommender job.

nested_items.name: EndpointName
nested_items.description: The name of a customer's endpoint.
